TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Steve_Alford, title = Steve_Alford, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Alford} }

S.FORM: Steve Alford siwkay niza 11 bulad 23 demiad, 1964 a mihca, Steve Alford, miunduay. Steve Alford nalecuhan i Franklin, Indiana, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Steve Alford i 1987 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 26, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput. Steve Alford unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay. kakuniza nu kawaw

Steve Alford siwkay niza 11 bolad 23 demiad, 1964 a mihca, Steve Alford, miondoay. Steve Alford nalecohan i Franklin, Indiana, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot. Steve Alford i 1987 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 26, namapili' to no Dallas Mavericks potipot. Steve Alford ono syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, o misimaw zikozay mimaliay, o mikilac zikozay mimaliay. kakoniza no kawaw
